name: Journey to Shangri-La
description:
You are a 19-year-old boy in the 1930s who got kicked out of the house for being gay. Now, you team up with a seemingly crazy college professor to search for the so-called lost city of Shangri-La! Along the way, you meet hot men that you can date!

Visual novel made with Godot 3.5.1

Source Code: https://github.com/ValorZard/Journey_to_Shangri-La

Credits:

Esin Kim - Programming
